title: Vision. [No. 32]
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, WH Productions, Donald Wrye, David Holden, Peter Schnitzler, Paul Ryan and Hiro Narita
brief_description: Cinemagazine: Hydrolab - for 7 days, four young scientists live and work in an undersea hydrolab studying the coral reef off the Bahamas; Blind skiing - ski instruction to the sightless; Art squad - in Los Angeles, a number of imaginitive artists have transformed plain city walls into colorful murals; Mary Decker - a track star at the age of 15 is seen preparing for a big meet, working out with her coach, and the race itself; Primates - the Yerkes Regional Primate Centre - a research facility devoted to the study of monkeys and the great apes. Narrated by Peter Haskell.
